body_html: Yes, in theory it's possible, but inception going to be very, very slow so that's probably not something that you'd want to do. Setting up cuda and cudnn can be tricky, but worth the trouble IMO.
body_text: Yes, in theory it's possible, but inception going to be very, very slow so that's probably not something that you'd want to do. Setting up cuda and cudnn can be tricky, but worth the trouble IMO.
body: Yes, in theory it's possible, but inception going to be very, very slow so that's probably not something that you'd want to do. Setting up cuda and cudnn can be tricky, but worth the trouble IMO.
